metadata.title: CVE-2021-3759 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [ unaccounted ipc objects in Linux kernel lead to breaking memcg limits and DoS attacks] It was discovered that the Linux kernel did not properly account for the memory usage of certain IPC objects. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion).
